bug.author: PinusSilvestris
bug.description: When working with PySpark Finisher does not seem to have this attribute implemented. finisher = Finisher() .setInputCols(["assembled"]) .setCleanAnnotations(True) .setOutputAsArray(False) .setIncludeKeys(True) .setIncludeMetadata(False) This happens on machine with Apache Spark 2.3.1 and SparkNLP 1.5.4

comments.comment: Thank you, I confirm this bug exists and fix shall be released this week
